metadata.title: CVE-2021-30565 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in Tab Groups in Google Chrome on Linux and ChromeOSprior to 92.0.4515.107 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to installa malicious extension to perform an out of bounds memory write via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
